metadata.title: CVE-2012-4552 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in the error function in ssg/ssgParser.cxx inPLIB 1.8.5 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted3d model file that triggers a long error message, as demonstrated by a .asefile.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4552` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libplib1 - 1.8.5-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: plib package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.5-6').
